name: pb-figma
description: Figma-to-code conversion with 5-agent pipeline. Validates designs, creates specs, manages assets, generates code, and verifies compliance using Pixelbyte Figma MCP Server.

agents.name: design-validator
agents.description: Validates Figma designs for code generation readiness

agents.name: design-analyst
agents.description: Analyzes design structure and creates implementation specs

agents.name: code-generator-react
agents.description: Generates React/TypeScript/Tailwind code from Figma designs

agents.name: code-generator-swiftui
agents.description: Generates SwiftUI code for iOS/macOS from Figma designs

agents.name: code-generator-vue
agents.description: Generates Vue/TypeScript code from Figma designs

agents.name: code-generator-kotlin
agents.description: Generates Kotlin/Jetpack Compose code for Android from Figma designs

agents.name: compliance-checker
agents.description: Verifies generated code against design specs
